title: Step 1: Install the CPU
safetyWarning: Handle the CPU with care, avoid touching the pins.
description: Carefully align the CPU with the socket and gently place it.
tips: Make sure to align the triangle mark on the CPU with the triangle on the socket.

title: Step 2: Install the CPU Cooler
safetyWarning: Ensure the cooler is mounted properly to avoid overheating.
description: Attach the CPU cooler and secure it in place.
tips: Apply an even amount of thermal paste before placing the cooler.

title: Step 3: Insert RAM
safetyWarning: Apply equal pressure when inserting RAM to avoid damaging slots.
description: Insert the RAM into the correct slots, applying even pressure.
tips: Check the motherboard manual for dual-channel configurations.

title: Step 4: Install GPU
safetyWarning: Check that the GPU is securely inserted into the PCIe slot.
description: Install the GPU into the PCIe slot on the motherboard.
tips: Make sure to connect the power cable to the GPU if required.
